entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
